intro: Alicosta alpina, commonly known as the alpine alicosta, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Europe and western Asia. Alicosta alpina typically thrives at elevations above 1,500 meters, where it plays a role in stabilizing soil and providing habitat for alpine wildlife.
